text:
="preserve">Screen Gems Pictures is an American movie studio founded in 1999.
History.
It was founded in 1929 as an animation studio, and shut down in 1946.
It was revived as a television unit of Columbia Pictures in the 1950s.
It was a movie studio since 1999.
Logo in 2011.
Buffy Cuttler decided to create a Screen Gems logo for the upcoming film Friends with Benefits in 2011. He created the logo by having a cloud background with the 1965 Screen Gems logo on it.
